item.name: Authorization managment
item.description: API's for login, register and logout in basic way

request.description: This endpoint allows you to register a user in standard way using an email
This endpoint allows you to login a user in a standard way using an email

Access Level needed: 2
Adds company to database

variable.description: Id of the company in database

request.description:
Access Level needed: 2
Updates company's columns find by id

Access Level needed: 2
Remove specified reward from database. May throw ModelNotFoundException if reward is not in database.

User roles: user, moderator, admin
Display currently logged in user.

User roles: user, moderator, admin
Display a paginated(by 20) listing of the users.

item.name:
Return single user User roles: user, moderator, admin
Display the specified user by id.

request.description:
User roles: moderator, admin
Updates user's columns find by id

User roles: admin
Remove the specified user from database. May throw ModelNotFoundException if user's is not in database
